unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festival season, folks! From Cannes to the very desi IFFI in Goa, filmmakers and movie buffs are having a field day.
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festival season, folks! From Cannes to the very desi I F F I in Goa, filmmakers and movie buffs are having a field day.

unnormalised: Just last week, the Jaipur International Film Festival wrapped up, showcasing some incredible indie films. We hear whispers of a new director from Kerala, Priya Nair, whose short film, a poignant story set during Onam celebrations, is creating quite the stir. Everyone's saying it's got that rare Jeo Baby *vibes*.
normalised: Just last week, the Jaipur International Film Festival wrapped up, showcasing some incredible indie films. We hear whispers of a new director from Kerala, Priya Nair, whose short film, a poignant story set during Onam celebrations, is creating quite the stir. Everyone's saying it's got that rare Jeo Baby *vibes*.

unnormalised: And speaking of Goa, preparations are in full swing for IFFI in November. Think sunny beaches, hot *chai*, and even hotter debates about cinema! Rumor has it they'll be serving authentic Hyderabadi biryani at the opening night gala. Could this be the year an Indian film takes home a major international award? We're keeping our fingers crossed! Stay tuned for more updates from the world of film!
